name: Valmynd
short_description: Quick and low-weight Menu- and Desktop Entry Editor following the Freedesktop.org specifications, written in Vala. As of yet, it provides an easy way changing options and making desktop theme exceptions in any GTK userland (Gnome, XFCE, OpenBox, ...).
